titlestmt.subtitle: An inventory of his papers at Syracuse University

list.item: 19 Jul 2006 - minor changes to subject headings (MRR)

did.head: Overview of the Collection
did.abstract: American educator and planner for the Roosevelt and Truman Administrations.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence, conference papers, curricula, articles, diaries, speeches, a few photographs and videotapes.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: See also the Alan K. Campbell Papers and the records of the Interuniversity Case Program

controlaccess.head: Subject and Genre Headings
controlaccess.subject: Politics, government and public administration
controlaccess.corpname: American Consortium for International Public Administration.
Coalition to Improve Management in State and Local Government.
University of Pittsburgh. -- Graduate School of Public and International Affairs.
controlaccess.subject: Government executives, Training of -- United States.
Municipal government -- United States.
Public administration -- Study and teaching -- United States.
State governments.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: The majority of our archival and manuscript collections are housed offsite and require advanced notice for retrieval. Researchers are encouraged to contact us in advance concerning the collection material they wish to access for their research.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Written permission must be obtained from SCRC and all relevant rights holders before publishing quotations, excerpts or images from any materials in this collection.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Preferred citation for this material is as follows:
